about_the_game:
BackRooms X is an atmospheric survival-horror game that immerses you in a world of endless corridors and mysterious rooms that exist beyond reality. You are an employee of ASync who, while on a mission, accidentally gets lost in BackRooms - a place full of dangers, puzzles and horrible creatures.

The game has many levels where you will have to avoid strange creatures and solve puzzles to find a way out and survive. The gameplay is filled with elements of exploration and survival, where every detail matters.

We have combined the best qualities of such games as Inside the Backrooms, Backrooms: Escape Together and Escape the Backrooms. We offer a deep story, a horror atmosphere, a cooperative mode for co-op playthrough, challenging puzzles and a variety of levels with unique enemies.

This creates an engaging and multifaceted gaming experience that appeals to both single-player and team-based gamers.

We know how many different games there are about behind the scenes, we know which games have not yet been released, what people want to see in a particular game, what are the disadvantages, and with this we build this map.

The roadmap is designed to give you an idea of what's in store for you in upcoming updates, as well as how we plan to develop and improve the game in the future. In it you will find information about planned updates, new features, locations and improvements. We also listen to your opinions and ideas to make the game even more fun and interesting. Your participation is important to us, and we're excited to see the BackRooms X community grow and evolve.

You can check out the roadmap:

  • On our website 

  • Frequently record mugs in our Telegram channel

  • Spoilers with updates appear in our Discord channel
